backgroundInformationList.description: Notice of Passing of By-law 606-2021 - 3315 Midland Avenue

noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law 606-2021 to designate the property at 3315 Midland Avenue (Ward 23 Scarborough North) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

otherReferenceList.description: 2021.SC22.3 - Intention to Designate Under Part IV, Section 29 of the Ontario Heritage Act - 3315 Midland Avenue
By-law 606-2021 - To designate the property at 3315 Midland Avenue as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

subheading: In the Matter of the Ontario Heritage Act R.S.O. 1990 Chapter 0.18 3315 Midland Avenue City of Toronto, Province of Ontario
title: Notice of Passing of By-law 606-2021 - 3315 Midland Avenue
topics: Heritage > Designation of a heritage property
